pkgmetadata.longdescription: # ykenan_file> **`File read and write operations`**This is a simple log package. You can see[Github-ykenan_file](https://github.com/YuZhengM/ykenan_file)[PyPI-ykenan_file](https://pypi.org/project/ykenan-file/)## Use> install```shellpip install ykenan_file```> import```shellimport ykenan_file as yf```
